title: Fix unused import 'TouchableOpacity' in apps/native/components/auth/AppleSignIn.tsx
description: Remove unused 'TouchableOpacity' import from react-native at line 2:58. Error: 'TouchableOpacity' is defined but never used (@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars)

title: Fix TypeScript type safety issues in apps/web/src/components/notes/NoteDetails.tsx
description: Fix multiple TypeScript errors in NoteDetails.tsx: Lines 15, 23, 27-29 - Fix unsafe error typed value assignments and member access, use nullish coalescing operator instead of ternary (@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-assignment, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-member-access, @typescript-eslint/prefer-nullish-coalescing)

title: Fix unused import 'Stack' in apps/native/app/_layout.tsx
description: Remove unused 'Stack' import from expo-router at line 1:16. Error: 'Stack' is defined but never used (@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars)

title: Fix TypeScript type safety issues in apps/web/src/components/notes/CreateNote.tsx
description: Fix multiple TypeScript errors in CreateNote.tsx: Lines 18-19, 137, 149 - Fix unsafe error typed value assignments and member access, fix promise-returning function in attribute (@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-member-access, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-assignment, @typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises)

title: Add format task to turbo.json
description: Add the format task definition to turbo.json so turbo can run format across all packages
close_reason: Fixed by adding format scripts and prettier plugin dependencies

title: Fix lint issues in apps/web/src/components/common/UserNav.tsx
description: Fix issues in UserNav.tsx: 1) Line 33:15 - Replace with Next.js component for better performance 2) Line 55:19 - Fix promise-returning function in attribute (@next/next/no-img-element, @typescript-eslint/no-misused-promises)

title: Fix TypeScript 'any' type issues in apps/web/src/components/notes/DeleteNote.tsx
description: Fix TypeScript errors in DeleteNote.tsx: 1) Line 7:54 - Replace 'any' with proper type 2) Line 84:25 - Fix unsafe call of 'any' typed value (@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-call)

title: Fix TypeScript issues in apps/web/src/components/Header.tsx
description: Fix TypeScript errors in Header.tsx: 1) Line 15:6 - Use interface instead of type 2) Line 74:29 - Remove non-null assertion from optional chain 3) Line 75:30 - Remove non-null assertion from optional chain (@typescript-eslint/consistent-type-definitions, @typescript-eslint/no-non-null-asserted-optional-chain)

title: Fix unused import 'useState' in apps/web/src/components/home/ComplexToggle.tsx
description: Remove unused 'useState' import from react at line 1:10. Error: 'useState' is defined but never used (@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars)

title: Fix missing prettier plugins in tools/eslint-config
description: The eslint-config package uses prettier but is missing @ianvs/prettier-plugin-sort-imports and prettier-plugin-tailwindcss dependencies. Error: Cannot find package '@ianvs/prettier-plugin-sort-imports'
close_reason: Fixed by adding format scripts and prettier plugin dependencies

title: Fix TypeScript type safety issues in apps/web/src/lib/utils.ts
description: Fix TypeScript errors in utils.ts: Line 5:18 - Fix unsafe argument and call of error typed value (@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-argument, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-call)

title: Fix invalid eslint/config import in apps/web/eslint.config.js
description: In apps/web/eslint.config.js around line 1, the file imports `defineConfig` from a non-existent module 'eslint/config'. Remove that import and either (a) export the flat ESLint config array directly (replace the file to module.exports = [ /* your configs/plugins/rules */ ]) or (b) if you need a helper wrapper, require and use the typescript-eslint config helper instead (use the appropriate `defineConfig` from the package that provides it) so the module path is valid and the file exports a proper flat config.

title: Fix TypeScript type safety issues in apps/web/src/components/notes/Notes.tsx
description: Fix multiple TypeScript errors in Notes.tsx: Lines 13-20, 49-51 - Fix unsafe error typed value assignments, member access, and calls. Use nullish coalescing and optional chain expressions. Fix 'any' type issues. (@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-assignment, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-member-access, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-call, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-return, @typescript-eslint/prefer-nullish-coalescing, @typescript-eslint/prefer-optional-chain)

title: Add format script to packages/backend
description: Add a format script to packages/backend/package.json to enable pnpm format to work across all packages
close_reason: Fixed by adding format scripts and prettier plugin dependencies

title: Add format script to tools/typescript
description: Add a format script to tools/typescript/package.json to enable pnpm format to work across all packages
close_reason: Fixed by adding format scripts and prettier plugin dependencies

title: Fix missing @types/node dependency in packages/backend
description: The backend package's tsconfig.json references 'node' types but @types/node is not installed. Error: Cannot find type definition file for 'node' (TS2688)

title: Exclude iOS and Android directories from Prettier formatting
description: Add ios/ and android/ directories to .prettierignore since these are generated Expo directories that shouldn't be formatted
close_reason: Fixed by adding wildcard patterns and updating native app format script to use .prettierignore

title: Fix TypeScript type safety issues in apps/web/src/app/ErrorBoundary.tsx
description: Fix multiple TypeScript errors in ErrorBoundary.tsx: 1) Line 15:28-43 - Replace 'any' type with proper error type, fix unsafe toString() call 2) Line 20:45 - Use RegExp#exec() instead of String#match() 3) Line 57:23 - Remove or implement componentDidCatch method (@typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-call, @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-member-access, @typescript-eslint/prefer-regexp-exec, @typescript-eslint/no-empty-function)

title: Fix unused imports 'err' and 'ok' in apps/native/utils/exerciseCache.ts
description: Remove unused 'err' and 'ok' imports from neverthrow at line 2. Errors: 'err' is defined but never used (line 2:10), 'ok' is defined but never used (line 2:15) (@typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars)

title: Fix TypeScript 'any' type issues in apps/web/src/components/notes/NoteItem.tsx
description: Fix TypeScript errors in NoteItem.tsx: 1) Line 10:15 - Replace 'any' with proper type 2) Line 24:39 - Fix unsafe return and call of 'any' typed value (@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-return, @typescript-eslint/no-unsafe-call)
